Text:
Looks about right. Would have been even nicer if you could add subtitles. It's a little harder to find them for movies with fps other than 23.976 and sometimes it's just impossible.

Thanks for the encode though. I was just watching Keira Knightley's interviews with Jonathan Ross. Made me wanna watch her movies and this is the only big one that I seem to have missed, probably because of the subject matter.

Anyway, thanks again.
